Description: Prosecution Case - NMC Surfacing Limited - CDM 13(1). The case relates to a worker being struck by part of a falling air conditioning unit which fell while being lowered from a roof on 10 Nov 2017.  Issues including unsafe use of lifting equipment, working at height, manual handling, control of asbestos and welfare conditions were subsequently identified.
